description_for_user.description: Short, human-readable description of what will be executed. Written for user confirmation, not implementation.

who.description: Who or what executes the plan (e.g. user, tool, system).

what.description: Concrete operation being performed (not a goal).

where.description: Execution surface: filesystem path, service, account, environment.

when.description: When execution happens (e.g. immediate, scheduled, conditional).

how.description: High-level method description without commands or flags.

action.description: Atomic, declarative action with no branching or conditionals.

procedure.description: Ordered list of execution steps. No branching, retries, or conditionals.

touches.description: Resources or surfaces that will be accessed.

items.description: Hard negative constraint that must not be violated.

constraints.description: Hard execution limits. No soft preferences or guidance.

execution_mode.description: Whether this plan is only previewed or actually executed.
